posts.postText:
Ingame name: MRHANDS
Steam ID: STEAM_0:1:25484855
Reason: No reason specified 0_0
Length of ban: Likely permanent
What server were you playing?: The JailRP Server
Who banned you?: No idea D:
Why should we unban you?: Before I found out I was banned, I was a very active member of the jail server. I used my mic to put order in the server as the warden. I never rdmed once during my time on the server. I also was very good at getting other people not to rdm by convincing them of the consequences.

Additional information: The last game I played was around November. I honestly don't know why I was banned. I wasn't banned during my last game, and only found out I was banned after I tried to join a game three days ago.

Thats not your steamid

go into a game, type status, and copy the whole line.
That's not your Steam ID, your steam ID should look something like this STEAM_0:1:2340757
Do unban him, but sir you will be watched.

Unbanned.

Like Bird said, you will be watched.
